page.title: 14CARLTON INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: From the window of our classroom we can see the whole of the{Carlton {Industrial Estate;}we pass through it on our weekly journeys to the swimming baths. There are many different types of{factories;}these range from such varying things as manufacturing industries to warehouses used by local firms. Companies such as{Marks & Spencer, SR {Gent, Goodyear Tyres}and even{a {pickling factory}which can make your eyes water have units on the estate which is right in the middle of a number of villages and provides a good deal of{employment}for local people. Work at the estate goes on 24 hours a day and deliveries of food and non-food products are carried by road to all parts of the country.
